text: @RepMattGaetz Lol @60Minutes just flushed all of your lies down the toilet. “There is zero evidence that this virus came out of a lab in China,” says scientist Peter Daszak about the origins of coronavirus. The Wuhan lab doesn’t even have, in its inventory, the virus that causes COVID-19.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: 60 Minutes
entity.description: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Lesley Stahl, Scott Pelley, Anderson Cooper, Bill Whitaker, Sharyn Alfonsi, Jon Wertheim and Norah O'Donnell .

The correspondents and contributors include Sharyn Alfonsi, Anderson Cooper, Steve Kroft, Lara Logan, Norah O'Donnell, Scott Pelley, Charlie Rose, Lesley Stahl, Jon Wertheim, Oprah Winfrey and Bill Whitaker.
